headline: Ghost Inspector review
description: Ghost Inspector is a beginner friendly tool for desktop browser testing. It can perform end to end testing of email workflows. Read our review of Ghost Inspector - a browser testing tool.
negativeNotes: No real devices available for testing
Selenium compatible frameworks (other than JavaScript) not supported
Only Chrome and Firefox are supported
Test URLs need to be publicly available
positiveNotes: All tests are conductued in parallel with no extra charge
Coding knowledge not required to make tests
MFA workflows (email and SMS) can be tested
Easy to perform automated accessibility tests

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Browser testing tool
reviewBody: Ghost Inspector is a great tool for getting started with desktop browser testing. Some common features such as extensive browser support and live testing are missing or limited, but it provides enough power to new users to run complex end-to-end tests without overwhelming them. Ghost Inspector only supports desktop browsers - mobile testing is not possible.
